Here you can manage your languages. Note: Deleting language will also delete all database tables containing translations for deleted language. Please be patient as this process might take few seconds to complete.
Here you can update your language phrases. Note: Do not replace variables between [ ]. Click on Value name to edit.
There was an error creating backup.

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/uploads/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Make sure you download your most recent backup, and delete the rest.
Are you sure you want to restore database?

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your CMS PRO v.[VER] installation.
Here you can perform site maintenance, such as deleting inactive and banned users, create xml sitemap, and manage module slugs.
This will delete all users (not administrators), who have not logged in to the site within selected number of days. It will not delete users pending verification process.
This will delete all [NUMBER] users pending verification process.
This will delete all [NUMBER] banned user(s).
Generate site map xml file that you can submit to search engine. File will be stored in CMS root directory named sitemap.xml.
Rename system slugs. No spaces, one word and all lowercase.
This will empty cart data, used to store temporary user details.
Upload and install CMS PRO plugins and modules.
To reorder fields click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.
